original_text: And immediately the girl got up and began walking (for she was twelve years of age), and they were immediately overcome with amazement.
korean_text: 소녀가 곧 일어나서 걸으니 나이가 열두 살이라 사람들이 곧 크게 놀라고 놀라거늘

sentences.original_text: And immediately the girl got up
for she was twelve years of age
and they were immediately overcome with amazement
